text: mad‌yankarilekk avarute saheadaranaya su'aibineyum (nam niyeagikkukayuntayi.) addeham parannu: enre janannale, ninnal allahuvine aradhikkuka. ninnalkk avanallate yatearu daivavumilla. alavilum tukkattilum ninnal kurav varuttarut‌. tirccayayum ninnale nan kanunnat ksemattilayittan‌. ninnale ake valayam ceyyunna oru divasatte siksa ninnalute mel tirccayayum nan bhayappetunnu
